Name: mason_campus_2005_stairs
LayerDisplayName: Stair locations of George Mason University, Fairfax Campus, VA, 2005
Originator: Government Documents and Maps, GMU Libraries
OriginatorSort: Government Documents and Maps, GMU Libraries
Abstract: Each point represents the location of stairs in front of the buildings in the George Mason University Campus, Fairfax, VA. The information is based on the year of 2005.

    <descript>
      <abstract>Each point represents the location of stairs in front of the buildings in the George Mason University Campus, Fairfax, VA. The information is based on the year of 2005.</abstract>
      <purpose>The dataset was developed by GIS staff in the Government Documents and Maps unit  in the University Libraries 2005 to be used for the guide for those disable persons to move around on the campus as well as GIS analysis and mapping purposes. </purpose>
    </descript>
